title: Rising Star judge Monali Thakur slut-shamed for wearing a short dress on the show
text:
Rising Star judge Monali Thakur slut-shamed for wearing a short dress on the show IndiaToday.in | February 22, 2017 Telangana CM's donation to Tirupati temple made on behalf of state government Embed Feedback 
Rising Star judge and National-award winner Monali Thakur recently had to face some serious internet heat because of one short dress. Yes, you read that right. The singer had worn a short and cute dress for an episode of the musical reality show, but things took an ugly turn when she was shamed for wearing the said dress. Monali was told by an individual on the internet that she shouldn't wear such dresses, especially when she is expected to guide young contestants on the show. Monali lost her cool upon seeing the comment and gave it back in full to the person saying that she would continue wearing short dresses and that what she wore anywhere should not concern anyone. 
Monali has deleted the post since then. Watch Right Now
